author: stephenh
msg: Updated to work against a maven b5 style repository. Also, torque.jar can be used to specify the jar in the repository to use, or torque.jar.fullpath should be able to use an arbitrary jar, which I think Jon was wanting to do before.

msg: We should be using the released version.
